title: Portfolio Website
subtitle: Flask, HTML, CSS
description:
Challenge:
Needed a unified place to display past projects.

Stack:
I decided to use Flask because it can be very lightweight. 

Design:
I hard coded an admin page to easily add, edit and delete projects. That way, I don't have to open the codebase, push, and redeploy every time I want to update a project.

title: Mashmia
subtitle: Generates Custom Playlists in Your Spotify Account.      Python, Javascript, Jinja, Ajax, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, Figma, AWS EC2, Flask, SQL, SQL-Alchemy, Mixpanel, Spotify API, Spotipy
